description.raw:
During the last period, I had to explain to several people that were asking to me how to implement a custom physics engine for Ignition Gazebo that the support for them is not actually ready yet \(see for example the discussion in [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/421/support-simulation-with-bullet-physics/diff#comment-133094264](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/421/support-simulation-with-bullet-physics/diff#comment-133094264) \).

I used the `(coming up)` style already used for the `Distribute simulation across processes` feature. 

I think this is more clear of the current state of development.

I used the (coming up) style already used for the Distribute simulation across processes feature.

I think this is more clear of the current state of development.
